POL-PE-001.title: Permanent Establishment Trigger Assessment
POL-PE-001.description: Illustrative: Worker presence above threshold may indicate taxable permanent establishment exposure in-country.

POL-MC-001.title: Contractor Misclassification Screen
POL-MC-001.description: Illustrative: Contractors exhibiting employment indicators (exclusive engagement, direction, tools) require reclassification review prior to conversion.

POL-TRM-001.title: Clustered Termination Risk Protocol
POL-TRM-001.description: Illustrative: Multiple terminations within a single quarter in protected jurisdictions may trigger collective consultation requirements and extended notice obligations.

POL-REL-001.title: Cross-Border Relocation Compliance Review
POL-REL-001.description: Illustrative: Inbound relocations may require right-to-work verification, shadow payroll analysis, and benefit re-enrollment prior to start date.

POL-EQ-001.title: Equity Award Cross-Border Friction Assessment
POL-EQ-001.description: Illustrative: Equity grants to workers in high-friction jurisdictions require withholding review and may require local securities registration.

POL-BEN-001.title: Benefits Continuation Liability Window
POL-BEN-001.description: Illustrative: Post-termination benefit obligations including continuation periods vary by jurisdiction and worker tenure. Accrued obligations create a liability tail.

POL-PAY-001.title: Payroll Cutoff Clustering Alert
POL-PAY-001.description: Illustrative: Multiple events landing near the same payroll cutoff window may cause processing delays, incorrect period calculations, and retroactive adjustments.

POL-ENT-001.title: Entity Formation Threshold Monitor
POL-ENT-001.description: Illustrative: EOR headcount approaching jurisdictional thresholds suggests own-entity formation may be more cost-effective and reduce dependency risk.
